revised_title: Unusual Formation of the Human Heart: A Monstrous Case
tldr: The article describes a rare case of a human heart with a single auricle and ventricle, and a unique circulation system. The heart was situated in the abdomen and had a different structure than the typical four-chambered heart. This unusual formation led to a mix of dark and florid blood in the arteries, which may have affected the infant's health and survival.
